note.original: napi paṅgulo (sī. pī.), na ca piṅgalo (syā.)
note.snippet: ‘‘Na badhiro na mūgosmi, na pakkho na ca vīkalo
Kāsirañño ahaṃ putto, yaṃ kāsuyā nikhaññasi
rañño ahaṃ putto, yaṃ tvaṃ sammūpajīvasi

note.original: bahū jānapadā caññe (sī.), bahū janapadā caññe (pī.)

note.snippet: Nāhaṃ ajivhatā mūgo, mā maṃ mūgamadhārayi

note.original: rodantī paripucchati (sī. pī.), rodantī naṃ paripucchati (syā.)

note.snippet: Negamā ca maṃ anventu, gacchaṃ puttanivedako

note.original: kiṃ dhanena yaṃ jīyetha (sī.), kiṃ maṃ dhanena kīyetha (syā. ka.)

note.snippet: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca, avitakkitā maccumupabbajanti

note.original: ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
sabbahaṃ ṭhānaṃ (sī.), sabbaṇhaṃ gantvā (syā.), sabbāhaṃ ṭhānaṃ (pī.), sabbaṭṭhānaṃ (ka.)

note.snippet: Ehi rāja nivattassu, mā tetaṃ vinasā dhanaṃ’’
‘‘Kimheso mahato ghoso, kā nu gāmeva kīḷiyā

note.original: ajaddhumārīva (sī.), ajjhuṭṭhamāriva (syā.), ajaddhumāriva (pī.) majjhimanikāye, aṅguttaranikāye ca passitabbaṃ

note.snippet: Ye keci bhogā idha dhammaladdhā, sabbo so bhakkho anavayoti
Tatrā ca so usukāro, (ekaṃ daṇḍaṃ ujuṃ kataṃ;)
‘‘Ko nu maṃ usunā vijjhi, pamattaṃ udahārakaṃ

note.original: tvaṃ ca kassa vā puttosi (sī. pī.)

note.snippet: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, utrāsanti migā mamaṃ’’

note.original: yañca hessāmi (sī. pī.), taṃ meṃ hissāmi (ka.)
note.snippet: Yañca andhe na passāmi, maññe hissāmi
Yattha sāmo hato seti, paṃsunā patikuntito

note.original: ce sammajjanādāya (sī.), no sammajjanādāya (syā.), me sammajjanādāya (pī.)

note.snippet: Na me piyataro koci, añño sāmena
Ācikkha me tvaṃ bhaddante, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ mayaṃ’’
ca soṇā sabalā ca gijjhā, kākolasaṅghā adanti
Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ, ajeḷakañcāpi pasuṃ mahiṃsaṃ

note.original: pitaraṃ va jīvaloke (sī.), pitaraṃ va loke (pī.)
ayaṃ gāthā sī. syā. pī. potthakesu aṭṭhakathāyañca na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. syā. pī. potthakesu aṭṭhakathāyañca na dissati

note.snippet: Yathā mūgo ca badhiro ca, na kiñcitthaṃ abhāsatha’’
Kacci te madhunā lājā, labbhate sughare tuvaṃ’
Idheva tāva acchassu, yāva rājāna dakkhasi
Laddho ca me āvasatho, sāḷikāya upantikaṃ’’
‘‘Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā tiṭṭhanti vammitā
‘‘Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā tiṭṭhanti vammitā
Ukkā padittā jhāyanti, kiṃ nu kāhanti
Na taṃ sakkomi mocetuṃ, tvaṃ pajānassu

note.original: ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
note.snippet: Ahaṃ taṃ mocayissāmi, pakkhiṃ baddhaṃva pañjare
Passatu taṃ mahārājā, vedeho mithilaṃ gataṃ
Caturaṅginī bhīsarūpā, kiṃ nu maññasi paṇḍita’’
Yamunaṃ pavisa mā bhīto, khemaṃ vattavataṃ

note.original: imissā gāthāyānantare sī. pī. potthakesu – ‘‘sakuṇī hataputtāva, suññaṃ disvā kulāvakaṃ; tena tena padhāvissa, piyaputtaṃ apassatī’’ti iti ayampi gāthā āgatā
kacci taṃ nu ḍasī tāta (sī.), kacci nu ḍaṃsito tāta (syā.), kaccitānuḍasī tāta (pī.)

note.snippet: Na tādiso arahati brāhmaṇassa, dāsampi ohārituṃ
‘‘Yo sāgarantaṃ sāgaro vijitvā, yūpaṃ subhaṃ soṇṇamayaṃ
asamatthatejo, ko taṃ subhikkhaṃ dvirasaññu kayirā

note.original: nirindriyaṃ antaṃ asaññakāyaṃ (sī. pī.), anidriyaṃ santamasaññakāyaṃ (syā.)

note.snippet: Paricariya maggiṃ sugatiṃ kathaṃ vaje, pāpāni kammāni pakubbamāno
‘‘Sace hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatī
Vipphandamāne idha jīvikatthā, yaññesu pāṇe pasumārabhanti
Oropayitvā kesamassuṃ nakhañca, vedehi vittaṃ atigāḷhayanti
‘‘Evañhi so vañcito brāhmaṇehi, eko samāno bahukā
‘‘Tañceva tucchaṃ maghavā samaṅgī, hantā avajjho paramo sa devo
Tenāpi dhammena na koci hīno, evampi vossaggavibhaṅgamāhu
‘‘Caṇḍālaputtopi adhicca vede, bhāseyya mante kusalo matīmā
Na tassa muddhāpi phaleyya sattadhā, mantā ime attavadhāya katā
Manussabhāvo ca gavaṃva pekkho, jātī hi tesaṃ asamā samānā
Lābho alābho ayaso yaso ca, sabbeva tesaṃ catunnañca
Tevijjasaṅghā ca tatheva ajja, kammāni karonti

note.original: īso khaggaṃva muñcati (sī. pī.), bhante khaggaṃ pamuñcati (syā.)
note.snippet: Ko so parisamogayha, īsaṃ khaggaṃ pamuñcati
Etañca kho no akkhāhi, yajissāmi dadāmi

note.original: idaṃ padaṃ sī. pī. potthakesu natthi
note.snippet: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa

note.original: ayaṃ gāthā sī. syā. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. syā. pī. potthakesu na dissati
note.snippet: Bhovādi bhovādina mārayeyyuṃ, ye cāpi tesaṃ abhisaddaheyyuṃ’’

note.original: imā dve gāthā natthi pī potthake
imā dve gāthā natthi pī potthake
ghaṭṭiyā oparakkhī ca pokkharakkhī ca nāyikā (sī.) ghaṭṭiyā oparakkhī ca pokkharakkhī ca gāyikā (pī.)
note.snippet: Ghaṭṭikā uparikkhī ca, pokkharaṇī ca bhārikā

alternatives.alternative: ghaṭṭiyā oparakkhī ca pokkharakkhī ca nāyikā
ghaṭṭiyā oparakkhī ca pokkharakkhī ca gāyikā

note.snippet: karonti, puttā no jāyantu tato paputtā

note.original: idaṃ padaṃ natthi sī. pī. potthakesu

note.snippet: Saraṇesiniṃ anāthaṃ tāyatha maṃ, yācāmahaṃ patimāhaṃ ajeyaṃ’’
Sabbesaṃ bandhanāni mocesuṃ, yathā taṃ anupaghātaṃ

note.original: bahu ānandano ahu vaṃso (sī.), bahu ānandito ahu vaṃso (pī.)

note.snippet: Ye te vasaṃ na āyanti, vasaṃ upanayāmase
‘‘‘Natthi hantā va chettā vā, haññe yevāpi
Athettha bījako nāma, dāso āsi paṭaccarī
Kīṭova aggiṃ jalitaṃ apāpataṃ, upapajjati mohamūḷho
‘‘Saṃsārasuddhīti pure niviṭṭhā, kammaṃ vidūsenti bahū ajānaṃ
Kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ, na hi kammaṃ vinassati
‘‘Dajjemu kho pañca satāni bhoto, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ
Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, kākehi gijjhehi ca senakehi
Khādanti dantehi ayomayehi, ito paṇunnaṃ paralokapattaṃ
‘‘Usūhi sattīhi ca sunisitāhi, hananti vijjhanti ca paccamittā
‘‘Uṇho ca vāto nirayamhi dussaho, na tamhi sukhaṃ labbhati
Bhayānutappāmi mahā ca me bhayā, sutvāna kathā
Ānehi taṃ paṇḍitaṃ dhammaladdhā, irandhatī padacarā
Ete dumā pariṇāmitā, sobhayanti uragassa mandiraṃ
Esova no vivaratu etamatthaṃ, yaṃ vakkhatī hotu kathā
dutīyo vijayo mamajja, puṭṭho hi kattā vivarettha
Anusāsataṃ puttadāre bhavajja, yathā tayī pecca
‘‘Nāssa pīṭhaṃ na pallaṅkaṃ, na kocchaṃ na nāvaṃ
na gantuṃ iti mayha hoti, chetvā
Anusāsitā puttadārā mayā ca, karoma kaccāna

note.original: khippaṃ mocessata’ttānaṃ, mā bhātha āgamissati (sī. pī.)

note.snippet: ‘‘Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo
yakkha ahosi mūḷho, naṭṭhā bahū duggahītena loke
Kiṃ te sumajjhāya piyāya kiccaṃ, maraṇena me iṅgha suṇomi

note.original: sassuraṃ nu te (sī. syā. pī. ka.)
note.snippet: tuvaṃ yakkha mamampi nehi, sasuraṃ te
Yatthacchati naccagītehi nāgo, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷiññaṃ
‘‘Ubhopi te attamane viditvā, mahoragaṃ nāgakaññañca dhīro

note.original: ayaṃ gāthā sī. syā. pī. potthakesu na dissati
note.snippet: Dānena taṃ nīharanti, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ
Nikkhippa lakkhaṇe gaccha, mayaṃ te posayāmase’’
Mā bhoti paṭidevesi, mā ca tvaṃ

note.original: saṅkulā saṅguḷāni ca (syā.), aṅguḷā sakalāni ca (ka.)
note.snippet: me karohi tvaṃ, saṃkulyā saguḷāni ca
‘‘Athettha sakuṇā santi, karaviyā nāma te dijā
Yassa natthi sakā mātā, yathā natthi
Nīce colambate sūriyo, brāhmaṇo ca dhāreti
Sarassa sirasā vandāma, supatitthe ca āpake
Ajja raṭṭhaṃ anuppatto, kuhiṃ gacchasi brāhmaṇa’’
kaṇhājinaṃ kaññaṃ, hatthinā ca satena ca’’
ahañhi te deva, pāde vandāmi te suṇhā’
